title: Trump Misstates Facts on NC Immigrant Crime in SOTU
summary: Trump incorrectly linked a Charlotte murder to open borders, when the suspect was a U.S. citizen.
charlotte_impact: Highlights the importance of factual accuracy in political discourse and its impact on immigration debates.

title: Hayward Pool Filter Plant a Major Employer in Clemmons, NC
summary: Hayward, a Charlotte-based pool filter manufacturer, employs over 1,000 workers in Clemmons, NC.
charlotte_impact: Showcases the economic significance of manufacturing plants in smaller North Carolina towns.

title: Charlotte Trade Shows Leverage Custom Canopy Tents for ROI
summary: Exhibitors in Charlotte are using custom canopy tents to enhance brand visibility and ROI at trade shows.
charlotte_impact: Illustrates marketing strategies employed by businesses to maximize their presence at local events.

title: Mosaic Capital Partners Seeks Vice President in Charlotte
summary: Charlotte-based Mosaic Capital Partners is seeking a Vice President of Business Development.
charlotte_impact: Indicates growth and investment activity within the private equity sector in Charlotte.

title: Florence Airport Passenger Traffic Up Despite Route Loss
summary: Florence Regional Airport saw increased passenger traffic in 2025, despite losing an American Airlines flight to Charlotte.
charlotte_impact: Reflects the challenges and opportunities facing regional airports in maintaining and expanding service.

title: Women Charged in Torture and Death of Girl in Charlotte, NC
summary: Three women in Charlotte are accused of torturing and killing a child, keeping her in a dog crate.
charlotte_impact: Highlights a horrific case of child abuse and the urgent need for child protection services.

title: Homeowners Reassessing When to Sell in Shifting Market
summary: Homeowners in Charlotte, NC are reconsidering when to sell their homes due to changing market conditions.
charlotte_impact: Reflects the dynamic nature of the real estate market and its impact on homeowner decisions.

title: KPN Facilitates $20M in Acquisitions, Expands Partnerships
summary: KPN Consulting Services facilitated $20M in acquisitions and expanded economic development partnerships.
charlotte_impact: Demonstrates the role of consulting firms in driving economic growth and business development.

title: Firefighters Safe After Being Trapped in Steele Creek Blaze
summary: Two firefighters are safe after being briefly trapped while battling a house fire in Steele Creek.
charlotte_impact: Highlights the dangers faced by firefighters and the importance of safety protocols.

title: SC Hands-Free Ticketing Begins After Warning Period
summary: South Carolina begins issuing tickets for hands-free violations after nearly 12,000 warnings.
charlotte_impact: Addresses traffic safety and the enforcement of laws aimed at reducing distracted driving.

title: Former NASCAR Driver Lists Lake Norman Home for $6.5M
summary: A former NASCAR driver lists his luxurious Lake Norman waterfront home for $6.5M.
charlotte_impact: Showcases high-end real estate trends and celebrity presence in the Lake Norman area.

title: Drone Locates Suspect After Anson County Pursuit
summary: Monroe police used a drone with thermal imaging to locate a suspect who fled from a stolen vehicle.
charlotte_impact: Demonstrates the use of technology in law enforcement and its effectiveness in apprehending suspects.

title: Union County Courthouse Reopens After Threat
summary: The Union County courthouse reopened after being cleared following a reported threat.
charlotte_impact: Highlights security concerns and the disruption caused by potential threats to public buildings.

title: Kings Mountain Police Warn of Fraudulent Invoice Scam
summary: Kings Mountain Police warn residents of a fraudulent invoice scam demanding $3,500.
charlotte_impact: Alerts the public to potential scams and the importance of verifying invoices before payment.

title: American Airlines Employee Arrested for Bomb Threat at CLT
summary: An American Airlines employee was arrested for allegedly making a bomb threat at Charlotte-Douglas International Airport.
charlotte_impact: Addresses security concerns at airports and the serious consequences of making bomb threats.
